result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A Andrews Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid within 90 days or penalty of 2 years suspension of Driver's License for non-payment.

Huber with standard release conditions.  Sentence Credit of 108 days granted.
Concurrent with: Count 4
Costs to be paid within 90 days or penalty of 2 years suspension of Driver's License for non-payment.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Michael A Andrews Jr in court on huber bailee status, with attorney Kathleen A Lindgren.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to Counts # 3 and 4, penalty enhancer struck.  Counts # 1 and 2 are dismissed and read in.  Court finds the defendant guilty of counts # 3 and 4.  State gives recommendations.  Attorney Lindgren makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  Defendant's employer makes statements. 

The Court Orders the Following:
Count # 3
6 months Huber concurrent to Count #4.  (Credit - 108 days) HUBER WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS.
Costs: $243.00 to be paid within 90 days or up to a 2 year suspension of driving priviledge.  
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00 to be paid within 90 days or up to a 2 year suspension of driving priviledge.  

The Court Orders the Following:
Count # 4
6 months Huber concurrent to Count #3.   (Credit - 108 days) HUBER WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS.
Costs: $243.00 to be paid within 90 days or up to a 2 year suspension of driving priviledge.
